name: Timmy The Wizard
description:
Every time you shoot you sacrifice some of your health. Find key in each level to unlock the door to the next level.

Controls:

Right Arrow/ D Key - Moves Right

Left Arrow/  A Key - Moves Left

Up Arrow/ W Key - Jumps/Enter door

Spacebar - Shoot

Bugs: There is an issue with the player jump in some parts and collision with blocks while jumping. Game is playable and able to beat it.
